name: The Legends of a Furniture Cave
name_original: The Legends of a Furniture Cave
description:
This is a quick & simple puzzle game. 

**Level 4 sometimes bugs out**

Controls are the 1 through 6 number buttons and the mouse

A main theme of this game is about resource management and you will always loose your most popular item (or the most recently used popular item if there is a tie for first) after each level, you should try to play around that as best as you can.

Quasars' band camp:

https://cptnqusr.bandcamp.com/
